title: NJIT Day Unites the Campus in Joy (NJIT - New Jersey Institute of Technology)
text: ( Source : NJIT - New Jersey Institute of Technology ) These students competed in the Highlander games during NJIT Day. It was a day for togetherness; a day for school spirit; and a day to relax. It was NJIT Day -- Saturday, Oct. 10 -- when
